extendedInfo.description: If you are Beth Hart's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Beth Hart's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Beth Hart's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Beth Hart's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Immortal- Screamin' For My Supper- Leave The Light On- 37 Days- My California- Don't Explain- Bang Bang Boom Boom- Seesaw************************List of lyrics ************************- A Sunday Kind Of Love- Ain't No Way- Am I The One- At The Bottom- Bad Love Is Good Enough- Baddest Blues- Bang Bang Boom Boom- Better Man- Blame The Moon- Bottle Of Jesus- Broken And Ugly- Burn Chile- By Her- Can't Let You Go- Caught Out In The Rain- Chocolate Jesus- Close To My Fire- Crashing Down- Delicious Surprise- Don't Explain- Drive- Easy- Everybody Is Sober- Everything Must Change- Face Forward- Favorite Things- For My Friends- Forever Young- G.O.P.- Get Your Shit Together- Girls Say- God Bless You- Good As It Gets- Happiness... Any Day Now- Heaven Look Down- Hold Me Through The Night- House Of Sin- I Love You More Than You'll Ever Know- I'd Rather Go Blind- If God Only Knew- If I Tell You I Love You- I'll Stay With You- I'll Take Care Of You- Immortal- Is That Too Much To Ask- Isolation- Jealousy- Just A Little Hole- L.A. Song- Lay Your Hands On Me- Leave The Light On- Life Is Calling- Lifetime- Lifts You Up- Like You (And Everyone Else)- Love Is The Hardest- Mama- Miss Lady- Missing You- Monkey Back- My California- Nutbush City Limits- Oh Me Oh My- One Eyed Chicken- Over You- Rhymes- Ringing- Seesaw- Sick- Sinner's Prayer- Sister Heroine- Skin- Sky Full Of Clover- Sky Is Falling- Something's Got A Hold Of Me- Something's Got A Hold On Me- Soul Shine- Spiders In My Bed- Spirit Of God- State Of Mind- Stay- Strange Fruit- Summer Is Gone- Swing My Thing Back Around- Take It Easy On Me- The Ugliest House On The Block- Them There Eyes- There In Your Heart- Thru The Window Of My Mind- Waterfalls- Weight Of The World- Well Well- With You Everyday- World Without You- Your Heart Is As Black As Night
